'''Oni's Royale''' is a [[Character Event Wish]] with the 5 Star [[Character]] "Hanamizaka Heroics" [[Arataki Itto]] ({{Geo}}) as the promoted character with an increased chance to be obtained.

==History==
{{Wish History Table|Oni's Royale}}

==Trivia==
* All occurrences of this Wish Series have run alongside an [[Epitome Invocation]] Wish featuring [[Redhorn Stonethresher]], a weapon tailored to Arataki Itto's gameplay mechanics.
